explanation: [0-0] In a pink room, a young woman stands by the bed. She is wearing a green short-sleeved shirt and yellow pants, with her hands behind her back. The bed is covered with a green sheet and pink pillows. A little bit of greenery is exposed on the left side. There is a macaron painting on the wall. The subtitle "5-MINUTE CRAFTS" appears below.

[0-5] First, she pulls out a pink bra from her waist, holds it in her right hand to her side, looks up, then throws the pink bra to the left, opens her arms, and falls onto the bed. The white English subtitle "FINALLY!.." appears above.

[5-9] Then the scene switches to a bedroom, the subtitles above disappear, and two young girls are sitting on a yellow bed. On the right is a girl wearing a pink short-sleeved shirt and glasses, and on the left is a girl wearing an orange top with a pink pillow on her lap. The girl in the pink shirt picks up a blue bra and smiles at the girl in the orange top. The white English subtitle "CHILD" appears briefly and disappears. The girl in the orange top picks up a pink bra, they look at each other, squint, open their mouths and smile, leaning against each other. The background is a blue wall with a white wardrobe on the left side. There are stickers of ice cream and fruit on the wardrobe door.
